text: Christina Victoria Grimmie (March 12, 1994 - June 10, 2016) was an American singer, actress and YouTuber. She has performed cover versions of songs by Christina Aguilera, Selena Gomez and Demi Lovato. She released an extended play, Find Me, in June 2011. Her studio album With Love was released in 2013. A second EP, Side A, was released in 2016. ==Life== Christina Victoria Grimmie was born and raised in New Jersey. ==Murder== Grimmie was shot by 27-year-old Kevin James Loibl in Orlando, Florida at her concert. Her older brother, Marcus, tackled Loibl, who then shot himself after shooting Grimmie. She later died in a hospital on June 10, 2016, at age of 22. ==References== Category:1994 births Category:2016 deaths Category:21st-century American actors Category:21st-century American singer-songwriters Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:American pop singers Category:Murdered musicians Category:American YouTubers Category:Murders by firearm in Florida Category:Singers from New Jersey
title: Christina Grimmie
